item.title: Requests & Limits in K8s
item.description: Requests & Limits in K8s When deploying apps to Kubernetes (K8s) one thing to get right in your deployments are the requests & limits for both CPU & Memory (RAM). Understanding the differences between requests & limits, the consequences of the values you set etc are all very important things for you to understand in the K8s world.
